name: Garden of Worms
description:
Limitation: Mundane task or job.

Theme: Decay.

- Select a plant and click on garden square to plant it 

- Collect the harvest by pressing on grown plants 

Worms destroy plants, so you can: 

- Use bombs to destroy the nearest worms.

- Use attractors to attract worms You get new seeds with each grown and collected plant. 

Press M to mute or unmute the sound.

Credits:

- Game made by JokubasG.

- Music made by JokubasG.
